summary:
This mod adds Nordic-beauty "Herfjotur" to Skyrim. She can be found at the Temple of Mara, in Riften.
She is a dual-wielding warrior (two waraxes), is essential and is set to be married.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Herfjotur Follower[/size][/color][/font]


[size=4]This mod adds Nordic-beauty "Herfjotur" to Skyrim. She can be found at the Temple of Mara, in Riften. She wields two nordic waraxes and has appropriate perks in dual wielding and is marriageable. She uses the "Female Nord" voice set (Mjoll, Stormcloak Soldier) and as such requires Relationship Dialogue Overhaul in order to work properly. 

[font=Comic Sans MS][i]*Ran through TES5Edit & Playtested![/i][/font][/size]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mod Details [/size][/color][/font]


[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]Big Thanks goes to 

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]KS Hairdo's Renewal by Kalilies & Stealthic[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]The Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul by CloudedTruth [/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mods I'm using (Not included, but recommended)[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url]﻿ by Tktk1[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/]Better Females[/url]﻿ by Bella[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70]Nude Females[/url]﻿ by Thepal[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
